definition: a harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
sentence: The cacophony of the city made it hard to concentrate.

definition: lasting for a very short time
sentence: The ephemeral beauty of the sunset took her breath away.

definition: having an excessive interest in or admiration of oneself and one's physical appearance
sentence: His narcissistic tendencies made it hard for him to maintain relationships.

definition: representing the most perfect or typical example of a quality or class
sentence: She is the quintessential student, always eager to learn.
The chemicals in the soil were found to have deleterious effects on the ecosystem.
The herculean task of cleaning the entire house took all weekend.
The villain had a nefarious plan to take over the city.
The rancorous debate left a sour taste among the participants.

definition: equivalent in seriousness to; virtually the same as
sentence: His silence was tantamount to an admission of guilt.

definition: in a way that is present everywhere
sentence: Smart devices are ubiquitously found in modern homes.
